about_the_game:
A visual novel series with animations about a guy working as a security guard at the mall. The first episode shows him confronting a woman who allegedly stole a phone from a mobile shop.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Jeff, a security guard who spends his days sitting at his desk and cycling through the security camera feeds on his monitor.
Although his job is quite boring and the pay is modest, Jeff finds a sense of fulfillment in catching people doing something wrong.
In this episode of our visual novel series, Jeff’s vigilance pays off when he spots a woman who appears to have stolen a phone from the mobile shop.
Determined to get to the bottom of it, he quickly intervenes, confronts her, and escorts her to his office for a closer investigation.
Find out if the young, attractive woman is truly responsible for the theft, and how she reacts in this situation.
We promise a story with arousing dialogue, realistic-looking characters, and high-definition graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
All characters depicted are 18 years old and over.
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.
Sexual blackmail themes.
Contains straight sex scenes.

name: Security Guard Sex - Episode 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
